title: As an AMT User, I want to confirm a players Check In information
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - Clicking Next on the Photo tab will take the user to the Confirmation tab
 - The Confirmation tab will match the wire and data discovery
 - Nothing is editable on the Confirmation tab
 - The date will be the current date
 - The time will be the current time
 - There will be a Previous button, that when clicked, will return the user to the Photo tab
 - There will be an active Check-In button on the Confirmation tab

title: As a User, I want to Attach a Guardian's Supporting Documents to a Travel Authorization Form
custom_steps:
Wire:
Form: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK
Mobile: https://zpl.io/am9wMm3

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

AC:
 - If "Guardian" is entered in the Relationship to Player field, an attachment is required
 - The attachment should have a label of "Guardian Documents"
 - If "Guardian" is entered and there are no files attached, the form will not pass the required field check on save
 - If "Guardian" is entered and there are the files attached, but none have the "Guardian Documents" label, the form will not pass the required field check on save

title: As an AMT User, I want to Check Out a Player from his profile
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/bWgMLB7

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

AC:
 - When a prospect is checked in, he will have a "Check Out" button on his profile, as depicted by the wire (different icon than check in)
 - Clicking the Check Out button will open a modal prompting the user to confirm they wish to check out the player
 - The modal will match the provided wire
  -- If the user declines, the modal will close and the user will be returned to the profile
  -- If the user accepts, the player will be checked out
 - A green "Checked Out" confirmation will be displayed on the player's profile
 - The Prospect's status on his profile will be updated to Check-Out
 - His Check-In History widget on his profile will update to show his Check Out Date
 - The Check Out button on his profile will switch back to a Check In button
 - The prospect will no longer appear under the Checked In filter on the prospects dashboard
 - The Checked In Tally will update on the BOC's Club Dashboard

title: As an AMT User, I want to complete the Check In process for a player
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - There will be an active Check In button on the Confirmation tab
 - Clicking the Check In button will check in the player
 - The user will return the prospect's profile and a green "Checked In" confirmation will be displayed, as depicted
 - The Prospect's status on his profile will be updated to Check-In
 - There will be a new entry on his Check-In History widget on his profile
 - The Check In button will update to a Check Out button on his profile, as depicted
 - The prospect will appear under the Checked In filter on the prospects dashboard
 - The Checked In Tally will update on the BOC's Club Dashboard
 - The Photo on the prospect's profile will update to show the most recent check in photo

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to upload a picture while checking in a Player
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/2pn8OqM

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
  - When BOC Users come to the Photo tab of the Check In modal, they will have the option of taking a photo with their device (same flow as for Club Users) or of uploading a previously taken photo (hyperlink in the wireframe)
  - Clicking this link will open a file browser where they can select a file saved on their device
  - After choosing a photo, it will be displayed in the modal and they will have the option of Uploading A Different Photo
  - Clicking this button will open the file browser again

title: As a user I do not want the checkin/checkout dates defaulted under the parent/guardian section unless they're required
custom_steps:
**AC:**
- If the checkbox "The Club is providing lodging for parent/guardian" is NOT checked the Check-in and Check-out Date fields should not be defaulted to anything
- If the checkbox "The Club is providing lodging for parent/guardian" IS checked the Check-in and Check-out Date fields should default to today's date.

title: As an AMT User, I want to Check Out a Player from the Prospect Dashboard
custom_steps:
Wire:
Prospect Dashboard: https://zpl.io/VqlqJeG
Checkout: https://zpl.io/bWgMLB7

Data Discovery:
 - When a prospect is checked in, he will have a checkbox next to his name on the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted
 - When the check box is checked, the "Check Out" button will become active
 - Multiple players may be selected at one time
 - Each row that's selected should have active row styling
 - Clicking the Check Out button will open a modal prompting the user to confirm they wish to check out the player:
  **Body** "Are you sure you want to check out X prospect(s)?"
  **Buttons:** Check out prospect(s), Back
  -- If the user clicks Back, the modal will close and the user will be returned to the prospect dashboard
  -- If the user clicks Check Out Prospect(s), the player(s) will be checked out
 - A green "Checked Out" confirmation will be displayed on the  prospect dashboard
 - The Prospects' status on their profiles will be updated to Checked-Out
 - His Check-In History widgets on the profiles will update to show the Check Out Dates
 - The Check Out button on their profiles will switch back to a Check In button
 - The prospect will no longer appear under the Checked In filter on the prospects dashboard
 - The Checked In Tally will update on the BOC's Club Dashboard

title: As a BOC AMT user I want clicking on the Prospects link on the top nav to default the Prospects table to All Orgs
custom_steps:
AC:
* Add an All option to the Org dropdown on the Prospects dashboard for BOC
* Remove any blank options in the Org dropdown
* Add an Org column to the Prospects table for BOC between the checkbox and Last Name
* Clicking on the top nav link "Prospects" should load this page with the Org dropdown defaulted to All
* If the BOC user clicks on a club from the club dashboard this page should still load with that club selected in the org dropdown

title: As an AMT User, I want the system to calculate and display how many days a player is allowed to be checked-in during the current period
custom_steps:
Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

Wire:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW

AC:
 - The system will calculate how many days a prospect is allowed to be checked-in during the current check-in period
 - This total will be based off the prospect's month's to signing date
 - The Prospect's total will be displayed on his profile and the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted
 - This number will appear as the denominator of the Days Used fields
 - This number will be static for the length of the check-in period

title: As an AMT User, I want the system to calculate how many days a player has been checked-in during the current period
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW

AC:
 - They system will count days a prospect is checked-in
 - Both the check-in and check-out days will count
 - The Prospect's total will be displayed on his profile and the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted

title: As an AMT User, I want the system to calculate and display a prospect's Next Check-in Date
custom_steps:
Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

Wire:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW

AC:
 - The system will calculate the next date the prospect will be allowed to be checked in
 - The Prospect's total will be displayed on his profile and the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted
 - If the player has days remaining, this field will be blank
  -- Example: If a prospect has only used 12 of his 15 allotted days, he is allowed to be checked in now.  Rather than display today's date, this field will be blank
 - If the player is out of days, the field will display the date he becomes eligible to be checked-in
  -- Example: If a player has used all 15 of his 15 allotted days, the date he begins gaining days back will be displayed
 - If the start of the next check in period is before the calculated Next Check In Date, display the start of the next Check In period

title: As an AMT User, I want prospects who are 12-18 Months from Signing to only be allowed 7 Days per period
custom_steps:
Rules:
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Examples

Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - If a prospect is 12 - 18 Months from Signing, they may only be checked in for 7 days
 - 7 will appear as the denominator of Days Used for these prospects
 - If the prospect is not checked out by the end of the 7 days, he will continue accumulating days until he is checked out

title: As an AMT User, I want prospects who are 6-12 Months from Signing to only be allowed 15 Days in any 90 Day period
custom_steps:
Rules:
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Examples

Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - If a prospect is 6 - 12 Months from Signing, they may only be checked in for 15 days in any 90 day period
 - 15 will appear as the denominator of Days Used for these prospects
 - If the prospect is not checked out by the end of the 15 days, he will continue accumulating days until he is checked out
 - After 90 days, the prospect will begin "gaining" more permissible days

 - If the prospect is not checked out by the end of the 15 days, he will continue accumulating days until he is checked out
 - After 45 days, the prospect will begin "gaining" more permissible days

title: As an AMT User, I want prospects who are Eligible to Sign to only be allowed 45 Days in any 90 Day period
custom_steps:

 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

title: As a Club AMT User, I want to be prevented from checking in a player that who doesn't have any days left
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

AC:
 - If a prospect is Overdue for a Club, that Club will not be able to check in that prospect
 - Clicking the Check In button will display a blocking message:
**Title:** Unable to Check In Prospect
**Body:** Prospect is Overdue and may not be checked in until [**Next Sign In Date**].  Please contact BOC with any questions.
**Buttons:** OK
 - Clicking Back will dismiss the message

title: As an AMT User, I want check in period data cleared out when a new Check In Period begins
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a new Check In Period begins (January 1st or July 2nd), all days used counts should be reset
 - Allowable days should be recalculated based on players' Months from Signing
 - The prospect dashboard should be cleared of players
  -- Checked In Players should remain on the dashboard
  -- DRAFT players should remain on the dashboard
 - Check In Histories for players should be untouched
 - Checked In Players should remain checked in
  -- The first day of the period will count towards their days used for the new period

title: As an AMT User, I want to be prevented from checking in a player that can't be checked in
custom_steps:
Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

Wire:
https://zpl.io/2ZjvMO1

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - If a prospect is more than 18 Months from signing, when the user clicks the "Check In" button, they system will return a blocking message:
**Title:** This Player Does Not Meet Age Requirements!
**Body:** [Check box] Check the box if you have received approval from BOC to check in this specific prospect.
**Hint:**  BOC will be notified upon check in.
**Buttons:** Check In, Cancel
 - Clicking the Cancel button will dismiss the message
 - The Check In button will be disabled until the check box is checked
  -- If the check box is checked, the Check In button will be enabled and blue, if clicked the user will be taken to the Check In prospect modal


*BOC Notification to be handled in a later story*
